Card.Name: Cephalid Sage
Card.RulesText: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

Card.Name: Flame-Kin Zealot
Card.RulesText: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

Card.Name: Golgari Grave-Troll
Card.RulesText: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, you may mill six cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Golgari Thug
Card.RulesText: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Ichorid
Card.RulesText: Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

Card.Name: Narcomoeba
Card.RulesText: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Putrid Imp
Card.RulesText: Discard a card: Putrid Imp gains flying until end of turn. Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Putrid Imp gets +1/+1 and can't block.

Card.Name: Stinkweed Imp
Card.RulesText: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Breakthrough
Card.RulesText: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Cabal Therapy
Card.RulesText: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name. Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Card.Name: Deep Analysis
Card.RulesText: Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Card.Name: Bridge from Below
Card.RulesText: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

Card.Name: Dread Return
Card.RulesText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Card.Name: Lion's Eye Diamond
Card.RulesText: Discard your hand, Sacrifice Lion's Eye Diamond: Add three mana of any one color. Activate only as an instant.

Card.Name: Cephalid Coliseum
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {U}. Cephalid Coliseum deals 1 damage to you. Threshold — {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Coliseum: Target player draws three cards, then discards three cards. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

Card.Name: Underground River
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

Card.Name: Watery Grave
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
